resources.string:
Welcome to Music Structure App. 

In this screen user will be able to select one of the following selection: 
hear WhiteNoises
or Lullabies 
change settings 
or set timer 

In the center there is a big play button which start or stop the player. This can be done using MediaPlayer. 

Press OK to disappear this box and enjoy the activity. 

Remember this app created just to present the structure of activity\â€™s and it's not playable. Although I have tried to create the most of the Interface making some features available.
You must select at least on sound

In this screen user will be able to select one or more sounds which will be played simultaneously when play button pressed. 

Also user will be able to select the exact volume which each sound will be played. 

Press on OK to disappear this box and enjoy the activity. 

Remember this app created just to present the structure of activitys and it's not playable. Although try to press the OK button with out choose any sound.
You must select at least on song

In this screen user will be able to select one or more songs which will be played contineously when play button pressed. 

Press on OK to disappear this box and enjoy the activity. 

Try to press the OK button with out choose any song.

In this screen user will be able to select if screen close during playing or not. 

Also if user choose screen stays on will be able to select from 4 diferent animations. This can be done using the Daydream or maybe call a static function loadAnimation() of the class AnimationUtils. 

Press on OK to disappear this box and enjoy the activity. 

Don't forget to change between On and Off option.

In this screen user will be able to select if they want to close auto play after specific time.
To keep screen on we can use PowerManager.WakeLock class, after we add this line in our Manifest file android.permission.WAKE_LOCK. 

Press on OK to disappear this box and enjoy the activity.
